text: Empa haeba leqhubu le ka ba koahela joaloka sekhurumetso, ba bitsa ho Allah, ba mo neha lerato le tlotla e totobetseng. Empa hang ha A se A ba behile kathoko lefats’eng ba ts’ireletsehile, ba bang ba qea-qea lipakeng. Ha ho mong le mong ea latolang lits’upiso tsa rona haese moeki ea hlokang teboho
